div.p: This code system http://www.fhir.org/guides/sushi-sandbox/CodeSystem/argo-group-characteristic defines the following codes:

tr.td: Patients are all at the location specified by the value which names the physical structures managed/operated by an organization (e.g., a ward, building, clinic, etc)

description.value: Used to define group characteristic and limited to 'location'|...

definition.value: Patients are all at the location specified by the value which names the physical structures managed/operated by an organization (e.g., a ward, building, clinic, etc)
